thread.title: Governor taps Southland's Keeping for state board
thread.title_full: Governor taps Southland's Keeping for state board

author: Michael Sheffield
title: Governor taps Southland's Keeping for state board
text:
Enlarge Alan Howell | MBJ Troy Keeping , general manager and president of Southland Park Gaming and Racing, has been appointed to the Arkansas Career Education and Workforce Development Board. Keeping, who was appointed by Arkansas Gov. Asa Hutchinson , will participate in development and monitoring of vocational and technical education policy in the state. The board will also have general supervision of all vocational, technical and occupational education programs as well as the funding of those programs. “I am immensely honored to have been appointed by Gov. Hutchinson to the Career Education and Workforce Development Board,” Keeping said. “I have such great respect for this statewide system, and I can’t wait to provide a helping hand in making a positive difference in the lives of Arkansans.”
